title: The Running Bunny
description: [Siren The Lynn Hagen ManLove Erotic Alternative Paranormal, M/M, shape-shifters, werewolves, HEA] After being setup, Taylor King must choose between going to prison for a very long time or ratting out his mob-connected godfather. The arresting agent gives him five seconds to make a life-altering decision. Should Taylor choose jail or being stuck in witness protection where he can eventually start a new life? Nevada Graton has just caught his lover in the ultimate lie and decides to walk away. The twins Matthew and Maddox invite him to live with them in Dalton Falls and Nevada takes them up on their offer. When Nevada and Taylor meet, there is no doubt they are mates, but Nevada begins to suspect that Taylor is hiding something. He's already been lied to and refuses to deal with deceptive men, but when Taylor's past catches up with him, will Nevada save the bunny shifter or leave Taylor to deal with a hired killer on his own? ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Lynn Hagen
